Record.ClassificationPath: Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Bacterial Infections/Gram-Negative Bacterial Infections/Tick-Borne Diseases/Tularemia
Bacterial Infections and Mycoses/Bacterial Infections/Gram-Negative Bacterial Infections/Tularemia
Record.Description: A plague-like disease of rodents, transmissible to man. It is caused by FRANCISELLA TULARENSIS and is characterized by fever, chills, headache, backache, and weakness.
